title: when is the login que gonna be fixed by? (approximately)
body: by the time someone responds, it will probably already be fixed (i assume) but whatever.

replies.body:
The login service issue has been resolved, so your prediction was correct. It took a bit, but we managed to put on our biggest cowboy hats and boots before tossing our lassos and wrangling the login server to get it back up. 

Let me know if you still have issues logging in.
